ooC: I guess I didn't reply to this. =p

-- Noir --

Noir nods as Devilcat explains the technology that the Rogues were 
using. Pheonix had unknowingly become the perfect 
spy. "Interesting..." Noir says, "The Predacons might discover the 
data transmission eventually... is it possible for them to trace it 
too our base?" Her metallic fingers drum once on the console, giving 
off a slight sense that she was a bit worried.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> Devilcat::
> 
> "Oh, just the visual feed from the trace program Torin hid in 
> Phoenix's systems."  Devilcat knew that sooner or later, they 
might 
> lose possession of their pacifist prisoner - that's why the Rogues 
> have had a plan B, which starts with keeping track of Phoenix's 
> location and activities full-time ... and if necessary, overriding 
> her systems and forcing her back into the fold.
>
